long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
LIRA is a free study tool that helps you easily take notes + get instant answers, undetected by tracking software.

- Select and right-click text, images, or links to save notes or ask LIRA questions
- Get accurate answers, summaries, and explanations without switching tabs
- LIRA automatically finds & highlights correct answers
- No more copy-pasting to ChatGPT

Study smarter, not longer - join thousands of students already using LIRA for free to improve their grades!
